# Reproval, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 170

*You rap the switch in your hand and then sharply against your thigh, finishing the final gesture that will bring discomfort to your foe.*

This spell functions like *[[Reproval (Spell)|reproval]]*, except that the subject is [[Cowering|cowering]] for 1d4 rounds instead of being [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round.

*Focus:* A stick at least 1 foot long.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *greater rebuke* to *greater reproval* to avoid duplication.
